DOC.brief_summary: To determine difference quality life patient undergoes laparoscopic transabdominal pre-peritoneal ( TAPP ) modify Lichtenstein hernioplasty
DOC.brief_title: QOL Incarcerated Inguinal Hernias : TAPP Vs Open Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Patients present incarcerated inguinal hernia randomize open laparoscopic repair group . The primary outcome quality life score . Patients followed-up 12 month .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Both gender Unilateral inguinal hernia Incarcerated inguinal hernia Elective set Anaesthesiologists ) Grade > 2 Recurrence Inguinalscrotal hernia Prostatectomy , Pfannenstiel incision , previous preperitoneal surgery Pregnancy Refusal general anaesthesia
